STBLKeyStringList.Text: Earbuds have been added to {0.SimFirstName}'s inventory.\n\nYou can use the earbuds from {M0.his}{F0.her} inventory, or you can click on {M0.him}{F0.her} while {M0.he's}{F0.she's} the active Sim and select the Earbuds menu.
{0.SimFirstName} conquered the Rock Climbing Wall endurance challenge!

{0.SimFirstName} was unable to complete the endurance challenge climb. Allow {M0.his}{F0.her} muscles to cool down for a few hours before trying again.\n\nHigher Fitness Skill can provide increased stamina if {0.SimFirstName} continues to struggle.

{0.SimFirstName} survived the first endurance challenge the Rock Climbing Wall has to offer. Not bad... can {M0.he}{F0.she} take the next step?\n\nTake a break to enjoy {M0.his}{F0.her} achievement and let those muscles relax before attempting another challenge.

{0.SimFirstName} beat the toughest vertical endurance challenge the Rock Climbing Wall has to offer... but there are more challenges yet to be conquered.\n\nTake a break to enjoy {M0.his}{F0.her} achievement and let those muscles relax before attempting another challenge.

{0.SimFirstName} bested the easier of the Rock Climbing Wall's two overhang endurance challenges! Not bad, not bad... Does {M0.he}{F0.she} have what it takes for the next step up in difficulty?\n\nTake a break to enjoy {M0.his}{F0.her} achievement and let those muscles relax before attempting another challenge.

{0.SimFirstName} made it past the second overhang endurance challenge - the toughest of its kind on the Rock Climbing Wall. Very impressive!\n\nTake a break to enjoy {M0.his}{F0.her} achievement and let those muscles relax before attempting another challenge.

{0.SimFirstName} survived the fifth and final endurance challenge! This dangerous challenge is attempted by few, and completed by even fewer... but {0.SimFirstName} can proudly declare {M0.himself}{F0.herself} amongst the list of victors, without a single singed hair on {M0.his}{F0.her} body!\n\nTake a break to enjoy {M0.his}{F0.her} achievement and let those muscles relax before attempting another challenge.
Uh huh! That's right! Climbing champion coming through! {0.SimFirstName} has defeated the toughest challenge the Rock Climbing Wall has to offer and lived to tell the tale!

{0.SimFirstName} did it! {M0.He}{F0.She} beat the top endurance time set on the Rock Climbing Wall! Now when other Sims want to challenge themselves, it's {0.SimFirstName}'s time they'll be attempting to conquer. Ahhh... life's good at the top!\n\nWhy not run and brag about {M0.his}{F0.her} achievement to the Sim whose time you beat?
Whew! If this were a rodeo, {0.SimFirstName} would score big points for how well {M0.he}{F0.she} clung to the climbing wall as it bucked to and fro.

Hello! I’m contacting you on behalf of Be Fit as a Fiddle Co. We'd like to send you a free sample of our newest product, Hitz Earbuds. If you'd like to buy more, we accept online orders through the computer. We also make a Treadmill Rock Climbing Wall, and offer fitness videos via your TV. Be well!
{0.SimFirstName} conquered the Rock Climbing Wall endurance challenge and set {1.Number} seconds as the new time to beat!

From the makers of the "Fountain of Gluteus Maximus" comes Trap's Trapezoid Tub! Every inch of this precision engineered whirlpool tub has been built with trapezius relief in mind. From the trapezoid base to the meticulously arranged jets, you won't find a better remedy for post-workout recovery. Be prepared... lowering yourself into the tub is known to cause your traps to slip into a state of instant bliss. Trap's Trapezoid Tub offers better muscle relief than any stretch or massage, along with the science to prove it!
The harmonious balance of this leaning bookshelf helps create the perfect feng shui for an environment conducive to reading, learning, and absorbing the teachings of renowned authors.
Anything nature can do, man can do better. Such is the nature of the Fractal Door, with an elegant bow tie pattern etched with mathematical precision to serve as the entryway to a home.

Don't be sad, the Tear Drip Drop Lamp is here to brighten your day! You'll save money by not paying for superfluous things like lampshades, and in turn your room will be fully lit. That's a win-win in anyone's book!

Don't be sad, the Tear Drip Drop Lamp is here to brighten your day! You'll save money by not paying for superfluous things like lampshades, and in turn your room will be fully lit. That's a win-win in anyone's book!

Don't be sad, the Tear Drip Drop Lamp is here to brighten your day! You'll save money by not paying for superfluous things like lampshades, and in turn your room will be fully lit. That's a win-win in anyone's book!

This stone's secret only reveals itself in the dark of night! This is no mere rock... it happens to be an exquisitely crafted light fixture. It's interior has been hollowed out with a surface so thin that light passes through to emit a pleasant glow.

This portal only makes itself traversable to ascendant Sims, of which there is only one known to be in existence... the Grim Reaper himself. Some say a tithe of restless, miserable souls would rend the portal open for a mere mortal, but this hearsay has never been shown to have a shred of credibility.

Ansim Adams, descendant of the famous nature photographer, tried to launch his career by subverting his grandfather's work through the use of full color photography. Unsurprisingly, art critics labeled this move as shallow and pedantic, and Ansim is a relatively unknown footnote in the history of photography.

What's the use of a good shag rug if you can't tell others about it? No need to be a gentleman; brag to all your friends about this sumptuous hand woven piece. Exquisitely crafted on a loom, the yarns and backing are joined together into one harmonious product that's guaranteed to retain its flawlessness for years to come.

Subdivide the fractal pattern on this rug and it'll be as if you received two rugs in one. Subdivide it again to quadruple your rug count! With this exponential growth, your floor will be fully carpeted in no time... I've run the numbers; the math checks out!

An ancient proverb states that "A rolling stone gathers no moss." Well, don't you worry - this stone won't be rolling anywhere anytime soon. Decorate your home with these lovely moss covered stones to assert that you're no longer part of life's rat race, and are fully content loafing about while reveling in your success.
Hitz Earbuds - music for Sims on the move!\n\nListen to your earbuds when you want to soak in the music, or simply turn them on when you're looking to multitask.

Back in the 20th century, Sims were known to use stationary climbing walls to simulate scaling a rock surface... can you imagine? How quaint! This sculptural piece hearkens back to those yesteryears... just don't try and attach a carabiner to it.
The glossy sheen on this towel rack's vaneer can be attributed to multiple years of bath towels being drug across its surface that were coated with the residue of natural body oils.
When is a mirror not a mirror? Perhaps it's when you gaze into the reflective surface and see an optical illusion. This mirror is no ordinary trick of the eye though, it's simply double vision.
A prefabricated shelf that allows you to bring a bit of nature into your home with ease. Simply pop the hinges open, lock them into place, and mount it on your wall.

Cleanse yourself of the shackles of the daily grind in the At One With Shower. Be at one with yourself, at one with nature, or at one with luxury. Regardless of your motivation, you'll slip into blissful serenity as your worries are rinsed away.

What seems to be a simple sink on its surface, can in fact play tricks with the mind when stared at. If you gaze at the Bilvet Basin from a precise angle, what once appeared to be two legs will suddenly become three.

This exquisite dining chair is made from Black Ironwood - a special wood that's one of the densest and heaviest known to Sims. Due to its high cutting resistance, carpenters actually shape this chair's frame by pounding on the wood with metallic hammers.
Is your body a bit pear shaped? Working to get that svelte form you know is the "true you"? Try the Counterbalance Living Chair - it's off-balanced in just the right way to accommodate you.

The Perfect Balance Chaise Longue offers a 'tough love" solution to those suffering from vertigo. With its squared edges and unforgiving backrest, it's a surface no Sim will desire to spend long on, no matter how dizzy they may feel.

The regional government of Shang Simla permitted the removal of the peak of Mount Ai-a-Nie after locals complained that the mountain was blocking a spectacular sunset from the viewing platform atop the Temple of Heaven. The top of the mountain was sliced clean off, and then divided into 60 equal slabs of rock. These pieces were formed into coffee tables and presented as gifts to dignitaries from other countries around the world. As years passed, some of these tables came into the possession of private dealers, and are now available for purchase at this extraordinarily reasonable price. Act now to own a piece of history!
A dining table fit for the 1%! The Signature V dining table incorporates a glass surface so that you can admire your expensive one-of-a-kind shoes while you dine.

Local artist Lansing Feltham crafted this end table based on sonar mappings of the Windenburg shoreline. This environmental study was carried out when the government tried to prove the existence of a long rumored sea-monster which locals affectionately referred to as Emily. While the results of the investigation were inconclusive, the reality TV series it spawned was thoroughly entertaining.
There's nothing artificial about this elegant hallway table. Don't mind the termites, that's the price you pay to bring the beauty of nature inside.
The Throne World exists as the antithesis of light. It serves as a plane of existence where the contents of a Sim's bowels descend into the dark bowels of the sewage underworld.

Conduct your workouts in a socially and environmentally irresponsible manner, namely... indoors in an air conditioned gym with membership fees and a lengthy application designed to keep out the riffraff.

Here at Be Fit as a Fiddle Co. we aim for the top - and so can you!

Have you ever felt like your life goals are just out of reach? Struggling to climb the corporate ladder and falling just short? We've got the solution! Introducing our Top Hitz Rock Climbing Wall, featuring an endless treadmill climb. We think it's a handy metaphor for the pivotal moments in your life; will you succumb to the grind, or will you strive for the top? Work out! Improve yourself! Success CAN be within reach!

*Great for simultaneously losing weight and building muscle.

This innovative window from Mr. Swisher contains a patented, fully automatic washing system to ensure it's always crystal clear. A small motion detector scans the area to ensure no Sims are nearby, at which point the scrubbing brush is engaged and travels the length of the window.
No matter how many times you duplicate this window, its fractal pattern remains the same. Therein lies the mathematical beauty of this accoutrement to architectural masterpieces.

Before you step up your muscle game, you better put some respect in your workout routine. Follow these common rules to practice good gym etiquette:

1) Wipe down gym equipment after every workout to remove sweat.
2) Absolutely no calls or texting near the workout equipment.
3) When the lunk alarm sounds, cease your workout and calmly proceed to the exit.
{0.SimFirstName} already has a pair of earbuds in {M0.his}{F0.her} inventory.
Thanks for ordering! The Earbuds {0.SimFirstName} purchased can be found in {M0.his}{F0.her} inventory.
This is too difficult for {0.SimFirstName}'s current rock climbing abilities.
Climb Overhang with Fire (Push the Limits)
{0.SimFirstName} has already set the current time to beat.
{0.SimFirstName} should practice climbing before attempting {M0.his}{F0.her} first endurance challenge.
{0.SimFirstName} must defeat the previous endurance challenge level first.
Defeat {1.SimFirstName}'s Time of {2.Number} Seconds (Push The Limits)

Upgrade complete!\n\n{0.SimFirstName} has finished upgrading the Rock Climbing Wall with self-repair functionality. Should the wall experience any malfunctions in the future, nanomachines will be released to restore its operational status in no time at all.
The Rock Climbing Wall will immediately repair itself after malfunctioning.\n
Form a group with another Sim before attempting a group workout.
Workout To Power Sculpting Video With
{0.SimFirstName} already has a pair of Earbuds in {M0.his}{F0.her} inventory.
Click on a Rock Climbing Wall, and attempt to survive longer than the Endurance Challenge Climb time set by another Sim.
Click on a Rock Climbing Wall and select Climb.
Click on a Rock Climbing Wall and select an Endurance Challenge Climb.
Purchase a Rock Climbing Wall from Build Mode. Look for it in the Active section of Activities and Skills.
Click on a TV and select Workout, then select the Plumboomba Dance Video.
Click on a TV and select Workout, then select the Power Sculpting Video.
